title: A Matter of care: a review of the work of the Repatriation Department
creator_contributor_role: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/War victims
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Soldiers - Australia

description: Examines the work being done by the Department of repatriation. In the hospitals the effect of the Department's activities can be seen in terms of the actual people who receive assistance and care. Also shows the social workers helping with problems of adjustment and therapy and training classes aimed at creating new interest in life. Script and direction by Cecil Holmes.
